plot: The authorities led by Dennis Ryland wants to quarantine every 4400, as several of them are sick with the same as Maia. Haunted by bad conscience, Kyle contacts Marsden's girlfriend.

A mysterious illness that robs the 4400 of their abilities while also making them deathly ill begins to manifest. As the illness begins to spread, the government orders NTAC, temporarily being headed up by Dennis Ryland once again, to round up all 4400 and place them back in quarantine. As the situation quickly escalates to a possible confrontation, Tom and Diana race to find a cure. Meanwhile, plagued by a guilty conscience, Kyle makes contact with the family of Jordan Collier's alleged killer.—nlghtcreature22-33-793191
